MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the PA16 postcode area of Greenock. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:00am to safely complete repairs on our underground cable network  on Cumberland Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:33am on Tuesday, 17 November 2020
